queue.willStillPlay: Still going to play for about $time
queue.queueIsEmpty: The song queue is empty. Be the first to order a song!
queue.queueIsNull: Botoholt doesn't seem to be affiliated with a Twitch channel. Or songs have not been ordered from this streamer for a long time!

history.historyIsEmpty: The streamer's history is empty. But he has everything ahead!

topDJs.allTimeIsEmpty: For all the time no one ordered a song 😪 But you can fix it!

topSongs.monthIsEmpty: This month there were no songs to order 🙄 But this is fixable! 😏
topSongs.weekIsEmpty: This week there were no songs to order 🙄 But this is fixable! 😏
topSongs.allTimeIsEmpty: For all the time there were no songs to order 😪 But this is fixable! 😏

notConnectedToBotoholt: This streamer is not connected to Botoholt😪
